trans-unit.source: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] space.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una x, y e punti delle coordinate z [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] spazio.

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a Point3D can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: In XAML, il delimitatore tra i valori di un Point3D può essere una virgola o uno spazio.

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: Alcune impostazioni cultura potrebbe utilizzare la virgola come delimitatore decimale anziché il carattere punto.

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: Elaborazione XAML per impostazioni cultura invarianti per impostazione predefinita su en-US nella maggior parte delle implementazioni del processore XAML e non prevede il periodo come delimitatore decimale.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a Point3D in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a Point3D attribute value into its components.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare di utilizzare la virgola come separatore decimale in se si specifica un Point3D in XAML, per evitare conflitti con la conversione di tipo stringa di un valore di attributo Point3D nei relativi componenti.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or ``` ## XAML Values *x* The x-coordinate of this Point3D.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` -or ``` # # valori XAML *x* la coordinata x di questo Point3D.

trans-unit.source: *y* The y-coordinate of this Point3D.
trans-unit.target: *y* la coordinata y di questo Point3D.

trans-unit.source: *z* The z-coordinate of this Point3D.
trans-unit.target: *z* la coordinata z di questo Point3D.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura in un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> e restituisce il risultato come un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunta di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>struttura in un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>struttura non è consentita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> struttura da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The sum of point and vector.
trans-unit.target: The sum of point and vector.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure and if so, whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> properties of the specified <xref:System.Object> are equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> properties of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato è un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura e in tal caso, se il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> proprietà dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>sono uguali al <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> proprietà di questa <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If `o` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `o` non è un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>struttura, questo metodo restituisce `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Double>valori possano perdita di precisione quando operazioni aritmetiche, un confronto tra due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>istanze logicamente uguali potrebbero non riuscire.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le istanze sono uguali. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> strutture per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: Due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>strutture sono uguali se i valori delle loro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>proprietà sono identiche.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Double>valori possano perdita di precisione quando operazioni aritmetiche, un confronto tra due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>istanze logicamente uguali potrebbero non riuscire.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.target: Codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Trasforma l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to transform.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura da trasformare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure to use for the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> struttura da utilizzare per la trasformazione.

trans-unit.source: A transformed structure, the result of transforming point by matrix.
trans-unit.target: Trasformata struttura, il risultato della trasformazione point da matrix .

trans-unit.source: Translates the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure by the specified amounts.
trans-unit.target: Converte il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura in base ai valori specificati.

trans-unit.source: This operation is equivalent to adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure with the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione equivale all'aggiunta di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>struttura in un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>struttura con i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A>valori.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the Offset method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che la chiamata al metodo Offset ha un effetto solo se è possibile modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>proprietà direttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>è un tipo di valore, se si fa riferimento un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>oggetto tramite una proprietà o un indicizzatore, si ottiene una copia dell'oggetto, non un riferimento all'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di modificare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>su un riferimento a proprietà o un indicizzatore, si verifica un errore del compilatore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling Offset on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, la chiamata di Offset sulla proprietà o l'indicizzatore non verrà modificato l'oggetto sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera modificare il valore di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>a cui fa riferimento come una proprietà o un indicizzatore, creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, modificare i campi e quindi assegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>nuovamente per la proprietà o l'indicizzatore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*> coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: La quantità per modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>coordinate di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>

trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura in un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> e restituisce il risultato come un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: Due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>strutture sono uguali se i valori delle loro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>proprietà sono identiche.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Double>valori possano perdita di precisione quando operazioni aritmetiche, un confronto tra due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>istanze logicamente uguali potrebbero non riuscire.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Double>
